name: 3D Ballz
description:

Tony Anh Nguyen:

 https://www.linkedin.com/in/tony-anh/

What is 3D Ballz?

3D Ballz is the first game I developed in collaboration with my classmate Tony. 

It's a 3 dimensional take on the popular mobile game "Ballz".

This was our first project creating a game in Unity from nothing and was a test of our ability to adapt and potentially improve upon already existing game design in order to create something new.

Features include:

  • Endless levels
  • Shop system
  • Different pickup/power ups
  • Different model balls to use
  • Rotating minimap

Controls:

  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • Left/right arrow keys to rotate minimap

Any tips for improvement are greatly appreciated!!
